title.rendered: World Press Conference on Preparations for 2023 Democracy Day Celebration under the Chairmanship of the Secretary to the Government of the Federation

content.rendered:
The World Press Conference on Preparations for 2023 Democracy Day Celebration under the Chairmanship of the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Senator George Akume, CON, held at the Rotunda Hall of MFA today, 9th June, 2023.
The 2023 Democracy Day Celebration, with the theme “Hope Reassured” will be low key with two major events, being the World Press Conference and the Presidential Broadcast by President Ahmed Bola Tinubu, GCFR on Monday, 12th June, 2023 at 7:00 am.
The Permanent Secretary, MFA, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa was among other dignitaries at the World Press Briefing.
